summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 FORD FUSION. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE REVERSING THE VEHICLE, AN ABNORMAL NOISE CAME FROM THE PANEL AND THE POWER STEERING WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. IN ADDITION, THE POWER STEERING FAILED AND WENT TO MANUEL STEERING HOWEVER, THE POWER STEERING RESET INDEPENDENTLY. THE FAILURE RECURRED FOUR TIMES. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHERE HE WAS INFORMED TO GO TO LOCAL DEALER. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO A DEALER NOR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 15V340000 (STEERING). THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN.
